channel.title: [DELTA] Adding Custom Emotes and Animations
channel.description:
I need help adding custom animations (that are to be used for emotes in a client I'm working on). I've got a non-renamed 317 Delta client. I have an animation already, custom-made, in .dat format, located in an anims folder in the Cache folder. I've been looking around, and I see the class files that need to be edited are class18, class20, class30_sub2_sub2, and class36, but I just don't know how or where to begin adding material. (Or what material to begin WITH, even)
I've heard of an alternate method, which involves adding the animation into the cache, but I don't know how to go about doing that.
So, I'm requesting some noob-friendly assistance with animations. Help please? c:

item.title: [DELTA] Adding Custom Emotes and Animations
item.dc:creator: @MeeE59 MeeE59
item.description:
@MeeE59 wrote:

I need help adding custom animations (that are to be used for emotes in a client I’m working on). I’ve got a non-renamed 317 Delta client. I have an animation already, custom-made, in .dat format, located in an anims folder in the Cache folder. I’ve been looking around, and I see the class files that need to be edited are class18, class20, class30_sub2_sub2, and class36, but I just don’t know how or where to begin adding material. (Or what material to begin WITH, even)

I’ve heard of an alternate method, which involves adding the animation into the cache, but I don’t know how to go about doing that.

So, I’m requesting some noob-friendly assistance with animations. Help please? c:
